description: This file defines the RecordsProvider class in Flutter, managing medical record data, fetching records from an API, and handling record creation with state notifications.

classes.name: RecordsProvider
classes.description: A Flutter ChangeNotifier that manages the state of medical records, including fetching and creating records via an API.

methods.name: fetchRecords
methods.description: Fetches a list of medical records from the API with optional filtering by patient ID.

methods.name: createRecord
methods.description: Creates a new medical record for a patient and refreshes the records list.
